title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to travel to US on official visit - CNBCTV18
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to travel to US on official visit  CNBCTV18
description: During Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's visit, she will attend the Spring Meetings of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) & World Bank, the G20 Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governor Meeting (FMCBG) meetings.
